definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to hold a funeral procession and burial/to give sb a final send-off/(fig.) to ruin (one's future prospects etc)
to bury a corpse/to be buried/(fig.) to die (at sea, in a fire etc)
to bury husband and wife together/joint interment
to be buried with or next to dead person (of deceased's partner, or of funerary objects)
to participate in funeral procession/to attend a burial

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒们相信耶稣基督就是被葬在了这座圣墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Jehoahaz rested with his fathers and was buried in Samaria.
sentences.chinese: 约哈斯与他列祖同睡，葬在撒玛利亚。

sentences.english: Dhaucer is buried in "poet's Dorner", as might have been expected.
sentences.chinese: 正如许多人已经预料的，乔叟被葬在“诗人角”。

sentences.english: Then Jephthah the Gileadite died, and was buried in a town in Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 基列人耶弗他死了，葬在基列的一座城里。

sentences.english: And Rehoboam rested with his fathers and was buried with them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 罗波安与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: He died and was buried with his fathers in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 众人将他葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: He ordered that Matilda's body should be buried in the family vault.
sentences.chinese: 他指示马蒂尔达的遗体必须葬在家族墓穴里。

sentences.english: The ashes of Puyi, the Last Emperor, lie in the Babaoshan Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 末代皇帝溥仪的骨灰被葬在八宝山。

sentences.english: And Abijah rested with his fathers and was buried in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 亚比央与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫的城里。

sentences.english: Before the golden tresses of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 当时死者的金发葬在墓冢。

sentences.english: And Jair died, and was buried in Camon.
He wished to be interred in the family grave.
sentences.chinese: 他希望被葬在祖坟墓地。

sentences.english: She asked to be buried alongside Louis at Saint-Denis.
sentences.chinese: 她要求死后葬在圣丹尼，路易十二的墓旁。

sentences.english: Then Elon died, and was buried in Aijalon in the land of Zebulun.
sentences.chinese: 西布伦人以伦死了，葬在西布伦地的亚雅仑。

sentences.english: The family buried the dead relatives in the churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 家人把已故的亲属葬在教堂墓地。

sentences.english: This is the Red Hill, there are many martyrs were buried in this hill.
sentences.chinese: 这是赤军山，有很多地烈士就葬在这个山上。

definition: to bury husband and wife together/joint interment
grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
